title: How to Make an Earthquake Survival Kit

steps.headline: Have a watch on news.
steps.description: Earthquakes usually come with warnings, so you might have enough time to be prepared. Weather radios can be of much use. Move to the next step for more information on this topic

steps.headline: Now comes the most important part.
steps.description:
Make a survival kit. The items must be stored in a backpack, not in a box because it will be easier to travel with a backpack than a box. It must include:-
1 liter (0.3 US gal) water bottles
Food[ canned or stored in a container or lunch box]
Clothes
Good footwear
A survival knife
First aid
Band-aids
Tablets (if you have any allergies or at a risk of a disease)

steps.headline: Don't forget these items with your essentials:-
steps.description: Weather radio Extra batteries Cell phone Toilet paper

steps.headline: Have emergency numbers.
steps.description:
These numbers should include:-
Ambulance
Fire department
Police

text:
Have a watch on news. Earthquakes usually come with warnings, so you might have enough time to be prepared. Weather radios can be of much use. Move to the next step for more information on this topic Now comes the most important part. Make a survival kit. The items must be stored in a backpack, not in a box because it will be easier to travel with a backpack than a box. It must include:-
1 liter (0.3 US gal) water bottles
Food[ canned or stored in a container or lunch box]
Clothes
Good footwear
A survival knife
First aid
Band-aids
Tablets (if you have any allergies or at a risk of a disease) Don't forget these items with your essentials:- Weather radio Extra batteries Cell phone Toilet paper Have emergency numbers. These numbers should include:-
Ambulance
Fire department
Police
